title: AirPods Pro 2 - Apple
summary: AirPods Pro 2 — Pro-level Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive Audio, Transparency, Personalized Spatial Audio, and a total hearing health experience.
full_text: To play sound that better suits your unique ear shape, Personalized Spatial Audio works with the TrueDepth camera on your iPhone to create a custom profile based on your head’s geometry. The profile syncs across your devices — delivering phenomenal sound every way you listen. Dynamic head tracking brings three‑dimensional audio to gaming and Group FaceTime calls. Directional sound helps make conversations feel like you‘re in the same room with your friends and family. Adaptive EQ tunes music to your ears in real time based on the fit of AirPods Pro 2. Inward-facing microphones measure what you’re hearing, then adjust the low to high frequencies of a song — so you get consistently detailed playback, every time.

title: Reddit - The heart of the internet
full_text: Hi for a little bit of context, i'm 15 and I live at home with my autistic brother who is constantly screaming and having huge tantrums almost constantly and would like to get some good Noise cancelling headphones. I have tried the airpod Max at the Apple Store and I thought the noise cancelling was excellent and as I was looking into it I also found the Airpod Pro has noise cancelling. Considering there is a huge price difference between the two all I really care about is the noise cancelling so if anyone can tell me if there's really much of a difference in noise cancelling or even if there's a better alternative from a different brand (Yes I know I shouldn't ask this in an Airpods subreddit) That would be great and I would really appreciate the help
